title: Review Patient-Reported Outcomes
description: A health outcomes researcher is analyzing patient-reported outcome (PRO) data from a real-world evidence study.

tasks.description: Import PRO data collected via a mobile app from a patient cohort.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully imports the dataset, including quality of life scores and symptom diaries.

tasks.description: Analyze the change in quality of life scores from baseline to 6 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs a statistical analysis and finds a significant improvement in the average quality of life score.

tasks.description: Generate a report summarizing the PRO findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a report with visualizations showing the improvement in patient-reported outcomes over time.
